game.title: The Lost Tome
game.objective: Find the lost tome of ancient knowledge.
game.description: The tome is rumored to be located in the ruins of the old library, which is said to be haunted.
game.reward: The tome of ancient knowledge, +100 experience points, and a new spell.

task.objective: Travel to the ruins of the old library.
task.description: The library is located in the forest outside of town.

task.objective: Find the secret entrance to the library.
task.description: The entrance is hidden behind a waterfall.

task.objective: Battle the ghost of the librarian.
task.description: The librarian is a powerful ghost who guards the tome.
The tome is located in a secret chamber in the library.

task.objective: Return the tome to Old Man Henderson.
task.description: Old Man Henderson is located in the town square.
